description.ar: رحلة الوصول إلى قمة فنون القتال هي رحلة وحيدة موحشة وطويلة. في مواجهة الشدائد يجب عليك البقاء على قيد الحياة والقتال بلا هوادة، وعندها فقط يمكنك الارتقاء ومتابعة رحلتك لتصبح الأقوى. تختبر طائفة الجناح السماوي الأعلى تلاميذها بأقسى الطرق لإعدادهم لهذه الرحلة، وفي أحد الأيام تمكن المتدرب الضعيف يانغ كاي من الحصول على كتاب أسود مما جعله على الطريق إلى قمة عالم فنون القتال.
description.en:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
description.fr: Le chemin vers le sommet martial (Martial Peak) est long et solitaire. Face à l’adversité, il faut survivre et persévérer. Il est alors possible de percer et poursuivre l'ascension pour devenir le plus fort. Le Haut Pavillon Céleste entraîne ses disciples de la manière la plus sévère afin de les préparer à ce voyage. Un beau jour, le modeste balayeur Yang Kai met la main sur un livre noir, le lançant sur la route vers l'apogée du monde martial.
description.ru: Путь на вершину боевых искусств - путь одинокий и длинный. Перед лицом невзгод ты должен оставаться сильным и неотступным. Только тогда ты сможешь преодолеть все препятствия и стать по-настоящему сильным. Небесная Башня обучает своих учеников самым суровым образом, чтобы они могли выстоять в мире боевых искусств. Но только из-за одного самого незначительного проступка наш главный герой, Янг Кай, может быть исключен из Небесной Башни.
description.uk: Шлях до бойової вершини - самотній, відлюдний і довгий. Перед обличчям негараздів ти повинен вижити і залишатися непохитним. Тільки тоді ти зможеш прорватися і продовжити свій шлях, щоб стати найсильнішим. Небесна вершина випробовує своїх учнів найсуворішими способами, щоб підготувати їх до цієї подорожі. Одного разу скромному підмітальнику Ян Каю вдалося роздобути чорну книгу, яка відкриває йому шлях до вершини світу бойових мистецтв.
description.zh: 《武炼巅峰》漫画版是由深圳漫画团队噼咔噼绘制，根据阅文集团旗起点中文网的同名小说改编，作者是莫默。武之巅峰，是孤独，是寂寞，是漫漫求索，是高处不胜寒。逆境中成长，绝地里求生，才能堪破武之极道。凌霄阁试炼弟子兼扫地小厮杨开偶获一本无字黑书，从此踏上漫漫武道。
description.es-la: El viaje hacia la cima marcial es solitario y largo. Ante la adversidad, debes sobrevivir y permanecer inflexible. Solo entonces podrás avanzar y continuar tu viaje para convertirte en el más fuerte. El "Pabellón Cielo Alto" pone a prueba a sus discípulos de las formas más duras para prepararlos para este viaje. Un día, el humilde barrendero Yang Kai logró obtener un libro negro, lo que lo puso en el camino hacia la cima del mundo marcial.
description.pt-br: A jornada para o Pico Marcial é algo longo e solitário. Indo de encontro com a adversidade, você deve sobreviver e permanecer vivo. Apenas aqueles que superarem os limites continuarão a jornada rumo ao objetivo de se tornar o mais forte. A Sky Tower testa seus discípulos de maneiras bem complexas para esta jornada. Um dia, o menosprezado Yang Kai conseguiu obter um livro negro, fazendo-o tomar rumo ao pico do mundo marcial.

title.en: Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You

altTitles.pt-br: Uma história sobre fumar no fundo de um mercadinho

altTitles.zh-hk: 在超市後門吸菸的二人

altTitles.en: A Story About Smoking at the Back of the Supermarket
Behind the Supermarket, Smoking With You

altTitles.ja-ro: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari

altTitles.fr: Fumer en bonne compagnie à l'arrière de la supérette
Deux fumeurs à l'arrière de la supérette

description.en:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
description.ru:
Сасаки, переутомлённый служащий, каждый раз проживает обычный напряжённый день ради единственного света в конце туннеля: Ямада, жизнерадостная продавщица в его любимом магазинчике.
В один день, Сасаки задержался на работе и когда он возвращался домой через магазинчик, смена Ямады давно закончилась. Однако, когда он вышел, то заметил молодую женщину с пирсингом курящую за магазином.
description.vi: Sasaki - một người đàn ông làm công ăn lương, vượt qua những ngày làm việc mệt nhoài nhờ có tia sáng nơi cuối đường hầm: Yamada - nhân viên bán hàng luôn vui tươi tại siêu thị tiện lợi yêu thích của anh. Một ngày nọ, Sasaki phải ở lại công ty đến muộn vì một cuộc họp nên khi đến cửa hàng, Yamada đã hết giờ làm việc. Tuy nhiên, khi sắp rời đi, anh để ý thấy một cô gái trẻ đeo những chiếc khuyên xỏ đang ngồi hút thuốc phía sau cửa hàng…
description.es-la: Sasaki, un asalariado con exceso de trabajo, pasa por un día estresante promedio solo por una sola luz al final del túnel: Yamada, la siempre alegre empleada de su tienda de conveniencia favorita. Un día, Sasaki se toma una cantidad extra de tiempo en una reunión de la empresa, y cuando llega a la tienda de conveniencia, Yamada ya se había marchado. Sin embargo, cuando se va, se da cuenta de que una mujer joven con piercings fuma detrás de la tienda......
description.pt-br:
Sasaki, um assalariado sobrecarregado, passa por um dia estressante comum apenas por uma única luz no fim do túnel: Yamada, o sempre alegre balconista de sua loja de conveniência favorita.

Um dia, Sasaki leva um tempo extra em uma reunião da empresa e, quando chega à loja de conveniência, Yamada já bateu o ponto. No entanto, ao sair, ele percebe uma jovem com piercings fumando atrás da loja. O que vai se desenrolar?

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en: The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers! As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

altTitles.en: I Grind Dungeons Around the World

description.en: Su Mu traveled to a parallel world, where everyone in this world will be forced to enter the game space when they are eighteen years old and become a challenger! Start various types of survival games in space! Hide and Seek! Become the victor..

altTitles.ja: ぼくらの☆ひかりクラブ
ぼくらのひかりクラブ

description.en: Chronicles the events leading up to the development and eventual downfall of the Hikari Club.

Power struggles, dark struggles, and betrayal in Hell 58, the island of the Yak-Kang-sik.  
Can the protagonist common people find hope and escape from this hellish island?  
  
 [Official Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/hell-58/list?title_no=1553&page=1)

altTitles.ja: 終末のワルキューレ

description.en:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.

---
  - Alternative English Translation: [<comikey>](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/)
description.fa: ⁧⁧ داستان جایی شروع میشه که خدایان بحث این رو به میان میاورند که انسان‌ها زنده بمانند یا نابود شوند. ولی یک والکری به تنهایی بحث را به سمتی میکشاند که به انسان‌ها اجازه یک مبارزه در مقابل خدایان داده شود. و به این شکل کور سوی امید بشریت روشن باقی میماند. سیزده خدا، سیزده انسان، در مقابل هم قرار میگیرند تا سرنوشت بشریت را مشخص کنند
description.fr: Tous les mille ans, l'ensemble des dieux, tous panthéons réunis, se réunissent au Valhalla, le paradis des âmes, lors d'une assemblée présidée par Zeus, le dieu suprême grec, afin de décider du sort des humains. Or, cette année-là, il est décidé à la quasi-unanimité de détruire l'humanité. Mais la Valkyrie Brunehilde interrompt la conférence et propose aux dieux de se mesurer aux mortels lors du tournoi de Ragnarök, pour déterminer s'ils valent vraiment la peine d'êtres anéantis. Ce tournoi opposera 13 dieux issus de diverses mythologies à 13 puissants humains qui ont fait l'histoire. Si l'humanité remporte au moins sept des 13 duels, alors les dieux épargneront l'humanité.
description.id: - In Indonesian by [Akasha](http://www.mncgramedia.id/comics/comic_detail/akasha-record-of-ragnarok-01) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.it: - In Italian by [Star Comics](https://www.starcomics.com/titoli-fumetti/record-of-ragnarok) as "Record of Ragnarok"
description.ru: История начинается c собрания богов, на котором они решают судьбу человечества: убить всех или оставить в живых, согласившись в никчёмности рода людского, боги выбирают первое... Но одна валькирия выдвигает предложение: позволить богам и человечеству сразиться в битве, в качестве последнего луча надежды людей. 13 богов сразятся против 13 чемпионов людей в битвах один на один, чтобы решить, будет ли человечество жить или сгинет в могуществе божественной силы.
description.tr: Hikâye, tanrıların insanlığın yaşamasına ya da ölmesine karar vermek için bir toplantı düzenlemesi ve insanlığı yok etmeye karar vermesiyle başlar. Ancak yalnız bir Valkyrie, insanlığın hayatta kalması için son bir umut olarak tanrıların ve insanlığın son bir savaşa girmesine izin verilmesi önerisini ortaya atar. 13 tanrı, insanlığın yaşayıp yaşamayacağına karar vermek için teke tek savaşlarda 13 insan şampiyona karşı dövüşecektir.
description.uk: Історія починається зі зборів богів, на яких вирішується доля людства: життя чи смерть. Погодившись з нікчемністю людського роду, боги вибирають друге... Але одна валькірія висуває пропозицію: дозволити богам і людям битися в битві, яка стане останнім променем надії для людства. 13 богів б'ються проти 13 людських чемпіонів у битвах віч-на-віч, щоб вирішити, чи буде людство жити чи згине у могутності божественної сили.
description.es-la: Los Dioses se reúnen con el objetivo de decidir si la humanidad debe vivir o morir. Y aunque llegan a la conclusión de que debe perecer, una Valkyria propone que una lucha de dioses contra humanos para tomar tan difícil decisión. Así, 13 humanos pelearán contra 13 Dioses para resolver el destino de la humanidad.
description.pt-br: A cada 1.000 anos, as divindades se reúnem sob o conselho de Valhalla para decidir sobre o direito da humanidade de continuar vivendo, ou por sua destruição, porém desta vez os deuses estão furiosos com o descaso humano para com o planeta, pendendo passim para aniquilar toda a raça humana, porém uma única valquíria os convencem de realizar o Ragnarok, uma batalha mortal entre humanos e deuses para decidir sob sua sobrevivência, 13 humanos enfrentarão 13 deuses. Serão este humanos capazes de colidir com as poderosas divindades?

description.fr: Yonggi a en réalité peur des femmes ?! Yonggi, beau et populaire comme jamais, semble avoir tout. Mais l'apparence peut décevoir, et il joue définitivement la carte de l'escroquerie à long terme. Il n'est pas le Casanova que tout le monde pense ! Un jour, son ancienne camarade de classe, Suyeon, arrive sur son lieu de travail. Sera-t-elle celle qui apaisera enfin son cœur inquiet ?

description.en: "If coincidences continue to happen, then it must be fate." This is nothing but a romantic phrase for Dojun, who's trapped in a harsh reality. However, a man coincidentally appears before him, just as he's getting over the end of his unrequited love. Once, twice. Will all these coincidences lead to both of their fates?

The Genius Fighter Jason Kim. However his winning streak ends with an accident during match, and he couldn’t use his left arm anymore.
After defeat, he quit the pro scene and returned to hometown, but the life is just hard to live quietly for such fighter.
He’s getting involved into endless fights, regardless of his will..

altTitles.ja: ケイヤクシマイ

description.en:
Kasane Hayafuji's secret joy in life is seeing Aoyama-san, a waitress at a family restaurant. One night, she saw Aoyama standing alone in the rain. When she tried to help, Aoyama suddenly made her an offer.

"Will you be my big sister?"

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/59079)
description.id:
Menemui Aoyama-san yang bekerja sebagai pelayan di restoran keluarga merupakan arti kehidupan Hayafuji Kasane. Pada suatu hari, Kasane memutuskan membantu Aoyama-san yang tengah berdiam diri di tengah guyuran hujan. Kemudian, Aoyama-san tiba-tiba menawari Kasane perjanjian saudari.

“Bersediakah kamu… menjadi kakakku?”

altTitles.ja: 堕落家族論

description.en: Ririko passed away, leaving behind her young daughter, Meguru, and a will. In the will she states that Meguru should get to know both Touma and Sentarou, then choose which one she wants to be her father. Now, a young Meguru has to live together with the squabbling duo for the next 3 months. Who will she choose to be her papa?!

title.en: Usotsuki Satsuki wa Shi ga Mieru

altTitles.ja: ウソツキ皐月は死が視える

altTitles.hi: झूठा सत्सुकी मौत देख सकता है

altTitles.pt-br: A Mentirosa Satsuki Pode ver a Morte

altTitles.ja-ro: Usotsuki Satsuki wa Shi ga Mieru

description.en:
*"Hey... Tomorrow, you're going to die."*

Minazuki Satsuki, 16 years old. By all accounts your average 2nd year high schooler, 
apart from being a social misfit always declaring her classmates' impending deaths.
They've nicknamed her Usotsuki (Liar) but her eyes are special indeed. What she sees with them is..

The grand return of Ryoko-sensei, author of Shi ni Aruki!
A horror-suspense manga fighting backwards against fate.

*For every death (question), there must be a reason (solution)*
description.ru:
"Ты... завтра умрёшь".
Минадзуки Сацуки, 16 лет. Не считая то, что она необщительна и заявляла о смерти своих одноклассников, она обычная второгодка старшей школы. Её прозвище - "Лгунья Сацуки".
Впрочем, одни только её глаза необычны. То, на что она смотрит...
description.pt-br: E se você pudesse ver alguns momentos antes da morte de cada pessoa. O que você faria? Meu nome é Satsuki e sou uma estudante do 2° Ano, meu apelido é mentirosa, por ter falado a verdade as pessoas. "As vezes algo bom para uma pessoa pode ser a destruição para outras." "Você morrerá hoje".

title.en: JK Haru is a Sex Worker in Another World

altTitles.ja-ro: JK Haru wa Isekai de Shofu ni natta

altTitles.ja: JKハルは異世界で娼婦になった

altTitles.zh: 女高中生小春在异世界成为娼妓
女高中生小春在异世界成为游女

altTitles.ru: Старшеклассница Хару стала проституткой в другом мире

description.en:
Haru Koyama was an ordinary student until a moron classmate got them both in a terrible accident. 
Now Haru has been transported to another world where only men are allowed to be adventurers. 
Determined to make the most of it, she takes a job in the Blue Cat Nocturne brothel to make a living 
the only way she knows how. No cheat abilities, no powers, just her quick wits and naughty bits!

altTitles.ja: スケルトンダブル

description.en: A man dies a mysterious death just outside Shinjuku Station. Eight years later, his son, Yodomi Arakawa, is leading a tranquil life until he meets…an invisible man?! And to learn the truth behind his father's death, Yodomi will have to become invisible himself...

title.en: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All

altTitles.ja: 気になってる人が男じゃなかった

altTitles.ja-ro: Ki ni Natteru Hito ga Otoko Janakatta

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
A popular Twitter shorts series depicting the love story between a gyaru and her classmate she mistook as a guy outside of school, bonding over their mutual love for rock music.

---
Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
description.tr: Süslünün tekinin hoşlandığı çocuk aslında sınıftaki sessiz kız çıkıyor.
description.uk: Популярна серія коротких манґ у твіттері, в якій розповідається про історію кохання між ґяру та її однокласницею, яку вона помилково сприймає як хлопця поза школою, через їхню взаємну любов до рок-музики.
description.pt-br:
Uma Gyaru/Gal que não se parece tanto com suas amigas (Gyarus também) frequenta uma loja de CD's e se apaixona pelo funcionário(?) de meio período do local.
Mas mal sabe ela que o funcionário(?) na realidade é uma menina e é uma das suas colegas de classe.

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.

title.en: Yuusha Densetsu no Uragawa de Ore wa Eiyuu Densetsu o Tsukurimasu: Oudou Goroshi no Eiyuutan~

altTitles.en: I Shall Create the Hero's Legend Behind the Hero's Legend: The Heroics of A Royal Road Killer〜

altTitles.ja: 勇者伝説の裏側で俺は英雄伝説を作ります 〜王道殺しの英雄譚

description.en:
Yukina was a young man who hailed from the same village as the Yuusha who shouldered the fate of the world. Through a certain incident, he got ahold of the talking spear, Gram. It was a weapon that was on par with the legendary sword the Hero wielded. The first volume of an adventure fantasy of the youth with a realistic growth!

**Note:**
The artist Mao retired at chapter 20 and was replaced by Kuuma Arai at chapter 21.
description.id:
Yukina adalah seorang pria muda yang berasal dari sebuah desa di mana sang pahlawan yang memikul beban dunia juga berasal.  
Karena suatu insiden, dia mendapatkan sebuah tombak yang dapat berbicara bernama Gram. Dan itu adalah senjata yang setara dengan pedang legendaris yang dimiliki oleh sang Pahlawan.  
Kisah fantasi petualangan para pemuda dengan pertumbuhan yang realistis dimulai!

altTitles.ja: 隣の席の奴がエロい目で見てくる話

altTitles.id: Senior pemalas dan junior yang rajin

description.id:
"Senior aku mohon tolong pakai celananya!!"
Senior tempatku bekerja ternyata seorang jenius, namun saat di apartemennya ternyata dia seorang pemalas...!?

title.en: Ochikobore Kenshi, Tsuihousareta no de Majutsushi ni Tenkou suru - Kenshi no Toki wa Gomi Skill datta "Zettai Kioku" wa Majutsushi ni Totte wa Kami Skill deshita

altTitles.ja: 落ちこぼれ剣士、追放されたので魔術師に転向する ～剣士のときはゴミスキルだった『絶対記憶』は魔術師にとっては神スキルでした～

altTitles.en: The Exiled Failed Swordsman Becomes a Sorcerer ~ [Absolute Memory], Which Was a Garbage Skill for a Swordsman, Is a God Skill for a Sorcerer!

description.en: In a world where swordsmanship and magic clash, Durandal is born into one of the world’s most prestigious swordsman families. However, his innate skill is ‘Absolute Memory’. A skill that allows him to never forget anything he has seen or heard, but it was completely useless in swordsmanship where power is everything. Eventually, the banished Durandal encounters ‘magic’, and starts to change the life he had once given up on!!

altTitles.ja: ナインピークス

description.en:
A heartwarming tale of a father and son's bond.

After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him.

Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water...

When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
description.ru: Душещипательная история о взаимоотношениях отца и сына. Главный герой — Масио Гаку, не особо ладит со своим отцом. После ссоры с сыном, Масио Харуми умирает... Гаку даже подумать не мог, что с его отцом, не особо общительным человеком, придёт проститься так много людей. Вскоре Гаку решает пойти на рыбалку где по случайности падает в море, но сразу же выбирается с помощью какого-то странного человека... Этим незнакомцем оказался его отец, ровно в 2000 году! Теперь Гаку начинает помогать Харуми, своему отцу, добиться статуса лидера города и разобраться что же здесь происходит...
description.vi: Sau cái chết của cha, Mashio Gaku biết được một sự thật động trời: Cha cậu từng là gã du côn mạnh nhất thành phố. Thế rồi một biến cố bất ngờ xảy ra, đưa cậu trở về quá khứ 22 năm trước, khi cha cậu bằng tuổi cậu...

altTitles.ja: とけだせ! みぞれちゃん

description.en: Follow the antics of a snowman turned Yuki-Onna hellbent on destroying the sun with the help of a child named Himari and her Aunt Koharu.
description.vi: Hành trình tiêu diệt mặt trời của "nữ chúa tuyết" với sự giúp đỡ của Himari và họ hàng của mình.

altTitles.ja: GIGANTIS―ジャイガンティス―

description.en:
On that day, humanity was turned into “prey”―Gen is a high school student living on the island of Tsushima, a door to mainland Japan.

Along with his sickly sister, Misaki, and his heartwarming mother, Gen was living a peaceful life, all until an “asymmetrical monster” appears on the island. All hell breaks loose on the island of Tsushima.

These monsters devour everything from plants to animals, to humans, and mutate together. Will humanity stand a chance against these mutant creatures? Is there any hope?
description.uk:
Того дня людство було перетворено на «здобич».
Ґен — старшокласник, який живе на острові Цушіма, що є дверима до материкової Японії.
Разом зі своєю хворобливою сестрою Місакі та чарівною матір'ю Ґен жив мирним життям, поки на острові не з'явився «асиметричний монстр».

Після цього на острові Цушіма починається пекло.

Ці монстри пожирають все, від рослин до тварин і людей. Після цього мутують.
Чи матиме людство шанс протистояти цим істотам-мутантам?
Є якась надія?

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

title.en: Please Lay Your Eyes on Jasmine

description.en: Jasmine had an accident with her one-sided love, Duke Aion. The straightforward man, who had not paid attention to her before, who had consistently ignored her, for some reason, now caught the feeling… “Don't you like me? Is that a lie? "Why would I lie about that?" “I know. You are that kind of person.” He was in a phase where he broke off from his cursed love, but instead it took a turn for the worse.

altTitles.ja: 彼女の友達

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her ... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this? A fascinating erotic story drawn by Jura from the popular doujin circle "JACK-POT".
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？ 大人気同人サークル「JACK-POT」のじゅらが描く、魅惑の背徳物語。

description.en:
I entered my favorite romantic fantasy novel! I may be a commoner, but I'm rich beyond belief. I quietly watched the romance of the main characters in the original novel, assuming I would go back to reality after reaching the novel's ending... However, even after the ending, I am still stuck in this world! As a result, I learned the behind-the-scenes stories that I didn't want to know. My favorite second male lead, Kaelus, died. Living in poverty without him, I eventually became ill and died as well. I thought I would return to reality, but I went back in time instead. This is definitely... This means I have to save my beloved, right?

---
**Notes:**
* The novel of this series was originally released as R15, 7 months after being completed the book/ebook was later re-released as R19. The webtoon will follow how the novel was originally released which is R15.
* *For My Derelict Favorite* is the official English name on the Korean novel.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=8423030), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=794155)
description.hu: Hestia, a főhősnőnk a kedvenc regényének egy gazdag mellékszereplőjeként ébred egy nap. Rajongóként legelső dolga, hogy nemesi címet vásároljon magának annak érdekében, hogy az imádott drágaságát, a regény second male lead-jét, Caelust láthassa az arisztokrata bálokon. Hestia úgy dönt, csak külső szemlélő lesz, nem avatkozik bele a cselekményszálba. A regény eredeti befejezését követő évben azonban olyan váratlan dolog történik Caelus-szal, ami Hestiát mégis cselekvésre készteti, hogy a bias-a elkerülhesse a tragikus befejezést.1
description.ko:
"내 최애를 살려내!"
N회차 정주행할 만큼 애정하던 로판 소설에 빙의한 헤스티아,
엑스트라 of 엑스트라에 빙의한 덕에 주인공들을 직관하고 드디어 맞이한 작품의 엔딩!
엔딩 후 현실로 돌아가게 될 거란 예상은 산산조각이 나고,
소설의 엔딩 후 비하인드가 가장 애정하는 캐릭터였던 서브남 카엘루스의 죽음이라는 충격에서 벗어나기도 전에
소설의 엔딩 직후로 회귀하는데…!
그렇다면 이번엔, 내 최애를 지켜내겠어!

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

altTitles.ja: ダンダダン

description.en:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
description.ru: Призраки, монстры, инопланетяне, подростковая романтика, сражения!.. В этой серии есть все! Такакура, одержимый оккультизмом, не верящий в призраков, и Аясэ, девушка, не верящая в пришельцев, пытаются преодолеть свои разногласия, когда сталкиваются с паранормальными явлениями! Эта манга - не от мира сего!
description.pt-br: Takakura, um rapaz que é um fanático do ocultismo que não acredita em fantasmas, e Ayase, uma garota que não acredita em alienígenas, encontram uma estranheza esmagadora que transcende sua compreensão mútua…! Uma história de vinda oculta da idade!

description.en:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

description.en: A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

Alock, taking pride in being an aristocrat, falls in love with Klopp at first sight, a nobleman of a family of lower social status whom he met by chance.
Ignoring the difference in social rank, wealth as well as the taboo of both being Alphas, Alock approaches Klopp, only to be disregarded by Klopp who later marries an Omega.
Blinded by jealousy, Alock ultimately commits a terrible sin. Having learned the truth, Klopp takes a ruthless revenge. Alock struggles and tries to resist all while slowly enduring the price to pay for his sin…

"What you did wasn't love."
"If that wasn't love, I don't know what I should call this feeling."

If given the chance to turn back time, would it make a difference to the pair’s relationship?

'Can life become a blessing once again? 
Can I be guided towards the light once again?
Will I be able to see him along the path under the cedar trees once again?'

title.en: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件

altTitles.en: When I started streaming in another world, I ended up creating a large number of Yandere followers.

description.en:
Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming.

Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself.

This is not the tale of just a streamer… but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.

altTitles.ja: 魔弾の銃士

altTitles.th: สไนเปอร์กระสุนเวท

description.en:
Paraplegic ex-sniper Ha Yiha is getting a fresh start in the VR game “Middle Earth.” He hopes to become a powerful player and earn enough money to afford surgery, but there’s a small problem… an untimely logout leaves him playing as a musketeer, the game’s most ineffective class. Luckily, he’s able to use his real-life sharpshooting skills to take musketeering to new heights. As his unprecedented progress turns heads and prompts new quests, Yiha thinks he’s got a shot at success, but he may have just landed himself directly in danger’s sights.

description.ja:
いつも完璧を勝ち取る吉田ローガン。 しかし、不意の事故により下半身不随の障害を負い、社会から捨てられる。 絶望に陥った彼に訪れた、革命的なVRゲーム「ミドルアース」による新しい世界が始まる。 だが、とあるトラブルによりキャラクター選びを大間違い！一番能力の低い「マスケット銃士」を選んでしまう！ “クッソ…俺は他の奴と違う。俺が本物のマスケット銃の力を見せてやる！”

---

description.ko:
"하 중사, 이 미친놈아. 또 만발인 거 알아?"

이제 말뚝 박을 일만 남은 명사수 부사관 하이하.
그러나 불의의 사고로 하반신을 못 쓰게 되어 사회로 내쳐졌다.
절망에 빠져있던 그에게 혁명적인 VR 게임 [미들 어스]가 새로운 삶을 선사한다.
가상현실 게임인 [미들 어스]에서 획득한 돈은 현실의 돈이 된다!

하지만 캐릭터 생성 때 가장 성능이 낮은 캐릭터를 고르게 되는 바람에 망하게 생겼다!

"난 다르다. 이것이 내 마지막이야!"

흑색화약, 쇠구슬, 꼬질대. 진짜 '머스킷티어'가 무엇인지 보여주마!

description.ru:
Сериал про гиперреалистичную фэнтезийную игру! «Сержант Ха, ты сумасшедший ублюдок. Ты выстрелил еще раз в пулю?» Меткий стрелок Ха ЛиХа просто хотел навсегда стать частью армии. Однако из-за несчастного случая он стал парализованным и был отброшен обратно в общество. Революционная игра VR [Средиземье] подарила ему новую жизнь. Деньги, полученные в [Средиземье], имеют реальную ценность! Тем не менее, он испортил свой шанс, выбрав персонажа самого низкого уровня! «Я не такой, как другие. Это все, что у меня есть». Черный порох, железные шары и шомполы ... Я вам всем покажу, что такое настоящий «мушкетер»!

description.th:
ฮาลีฮา นักแม่นปืนแห่งทหารกองหนุนได้เกิดอุบัติเหตุระหว่างขนย้ายดินปืนในค่ายทหาร ทำให้เขาสูญเสียประสาทสัมผัส ของขาทั้งสองข้าง เดินไม่ได้ และต้องใช้เงินผ่าตัดเป็นจำนวนสองพันล้านวอน

หลังจากที่แม่ของเขาเห็นเขาเศร้า หมดอาลัยที่สูญเสียขา ทำให้เธอซื้อเครื่องเล่นเกมเสมือนจริงมาให้เขาเล่น ซึ่งใช้ในการหาเงินได้ด้วย เขารู้สึกดีใจมากที่ได้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้งแม้จะเป็นในเกม และเขาก็ได้ใช้ทักษะนักแม่นปืนของเขากับเกมนี้ด้วย

เขาหวังว่าจะสามารถหาเงินจากการเล่นเกมมาผ่าตัดขาตัวเองให้กลับมาเดินได้อีกครั้ง

description.pt-br:
Uma série sobre um jogo de fantasia hiper-realista!  
  
“Sargento Ha, seu louco bastardo. Você acertou todos os alvos outra vez?”  
  
O atirador Ha LeeHa simplesmente queria fazer parte do exército para sempre. No entanto, devido a um infeliz acidente, ele ficou paraplégico e foi jogado de volta à sociedade.  
  
O revolucionário jogo de realidade virtual [Terra Média] apresentou-lhe uma nova vida. O dinheiro obtido na [Terra Média] tem valor no mundo real! Ainda assim, ele arruinou sua chance ao selecionar o personagem de nível mais baixo!  
  
“Eu não sou como os outros. Isso é tudo que tenho.”  
  
Pólvora preta, bolas de ferro e varetas… Vou mostrar a todos o que é um verdadeiro ‘mosqueteiro’!

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

description.en:
Trapped between two sides.  
  
The Resistance, or The Land of Magic?  
  
Rumors have spread of a Magical Girl with the ability to cancel death. To confirm these rumors, the Land of Magic sends two Magical Girls to investigate.  
  
What they found instead was a large dome-like barrier. Inside were a group of Magical Girls, calling themselves The Resistance. They claim to fight against what they believe is the corrupted regime of the Land of Magic. As the Land of Magic loses contact with their two agents, tensions escalate as both sides are locked in a clash within F-City.  
  
Experience both sides of the story in this Magical Girl vs. Magical Girl conflict.

description.en:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.

description.ja:
オチないアイツに、最強モテ女が大奮闘！「アイツのことなんて、ぜんっぜん好きじゃないないのに！！」

容姿端麗！ スタイル抜群！ 川井モナは、息をするようにモテる女!!　しかし、そんな彼女に見向きもしない転校生・黒岩メダカの登場で、モナの学校生活は一変する！　「今までずっと、チヤホヤされて生きてきたのに!!」あの手この手でメダカをオトそうと大奮闘！　時にはちょっぴりカゲキなことも!?　
モテ女子×禁欲男子のラブコメディ、大勃発――!!
description.ru: Куроива Мэдака родился в храме и в настоящее время является монахом, проходящим обучение. Из-за правил своего храма он не может общаться с девушками и более того, он даже не знает, как с ними общаться. Мона, "королева пчёл" школы, однако настойчиво пытается заставить его влюбиться в неё, но он всегда игнорирует её, чтобы сохранить правила своего храма.
description.es-la:
La mujer más popular del mundo lucha contra un tipo que no le gusta. ¡Ni siquiera me gusta en absoluto!

¡Buena apariencia! Estilo excepcional! ¡Kawai Mona es una mujer impresionante! Sin embargo, con la aparición de un estudiante transferido, Kuroiwa Medaka, que ni siquiera la mira, ¡la vida escolar de Mona cambiará por completo! "  Ella se ha pasado toda su vida siendo consentida y ha hecho todo lo posible por ganarse a Medaka que aveces pueder un poco radical.

¡La comedia romantica de una chica popular y un chico abstinente está a punto de estallar!
description.pt-br: Kuroiwa nasceu em um templo e atualmente é um monge em treinamento. Por causa das regras do seu templo, ele não pode interagir com garotas - e mais, nem mesmo sabe como fazer isso. Mona, a "abelha rainha" da escola, insistentemente tenta fazê-lo se apaixonar por ela, mas ele sempre a ignora a fim de se manter íntegro quanto as regras do seu templo.

After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

description.en: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
description.fr: Un prince errant est parti pour briser une ancienne malédiction qui ensorcelle le royaume d'Amaryllis en réveillant sa princesse par un baiser d'amour véritable. Cependant, personne ne lui a dit qu'il y avait 7 princesses à embrasser et il doit maintenant prendre ses responsabilités en vivant avec elles pendant qu'ils découvrent pourquoi les habitants d'Amaryllis sont incapables de se réveiller. Parviendront-ils à être heureux pour toujours ?

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

description.en: It's been one year since Rin moved to Tokyo for high school. He was told by the landlord of his apartment that he didn't have to pay rent if he takes care of the landlord's granddaughter, which he immediately accepted. However, that granddaughter, Mako, ended up being a 20 year old college student who is completely incapable of taking care of herself. Even so, it was love at first sight for Rin, and he's been taking care of her ever since.
Satan's daughter is a succubus who just wants to play video games and chill at home, until one day he gets tired of her lazing about the house, and kicks her out into the human world...

description.de: Himuro ist Büroangestellter und der Nachfahre einer Schneefrau. Wann immer seine Gefühle außer Kontrolle geraten, werden seine Kollegen seinen eisigen Kräften ausgesetzt. Jedoch besitzt er entgegen seiner frostigen Fähigkeiten eine sehr warmherzige und freundliche Persönlichkeit. Er liebt Katzen und Blumen, auch wenn er ihnen nicht zu nahe kommen kann. Diejenige, die seine Gefühle immer wieder aus der Bahn wirft und sein Herz zum Schmelzen bringt, ist seine stets gefasst wirkende und ein wenig exzentrische Kollegin Fuyutsuki. Obwohl alle Kollegen durch den stetigen Ausbruch seiner Kräfte von seinen Gefühlen für Fuyutsuki wissen, ist diese vollkommen ahnungslos. Dies hält Himuro jedoch nicht davon ab, zu versuchen, ihr Herz für sich zu gewinnen.
description.en:
A cute fluffy romance about the decendant of a yuki-onna who freezes the surrounding area every time he talks to his cute coworker.

x.5 chapters are longer than normal chapters and have more fluffy content, make sure to read them!

---
Himuro is a living descendant of the Snow Woman from Japanese folklore. But anytime he's around his eccentric yet kind colleague, Fuyutsuki-san, he totally freezes up! Despite the snowstorm of love that rages on in his heart, and her complete cluelessness, will he take a step forward or stay frozen in place?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Penguin Random House](https://www.penguinrandomhouse.com/series/FQP/the-ice-guy-and-the-cool-girl/)
description.fr:
Himuro est le descendant d'une yuki-onna, une femme des neiges. Par cette filiation, il plonge inconsciemment son entourage dans un environnement proche de l'Arctique lorsqu'il se concentre.

Pire encore, il passe pour un homme qu'il n'est pas : perçu comme insensible et au tempérament glacial, il est en réalité chaleureux, aime les chats et les fleurs.

Son état finit par attirer l'attention de sa collégue Fuyutsuki, dont il est secrètement amoureux. Himuro se montre alors déterminé à capturer le coeur de la jeune femme.
description.id: Romansa lembut yang lucu tentang dekendensi yuki-onna yang membekukan area sekitarnya setiap kali dia berbicara dengan rekan kerjanya yang imut.
description.it:
Il manga racconta la dolce storia d'amore tra due colleghi, la tranquilla e dolce Fuyutsuki-san e Himuro-kun, discendente di una donna delle nevi, che letteralmente ghiaccia ogni cosa attorno a lui.

---
Questa è la storia di Himuro, il discendente di una donna delle nevi, e della sua gentile seppur particolare collega Fuyutsuki... Anche se a prima vista possono sembrare due persone imperturbabili, entrambi sono in realtà molto impacciati quando si tratta di questioni di cuore; infatti l’amore che Himuro nutre nei confronti di Fuyutsuki imperversa nel suo animo come una bufera di neve, impedendogli di compiere il fatidico primo passo. Lei, d’altro canto, pare del tutto inconsapevole dei suoi stessi sentimenti...
description.ja: 現代を生きる雪女の末裔な氷室くんと、同僚のちょっとユニークで優しい冬月さん。一見、クールに見えつつも、二人は恋愛にすっごく不器用。冬月さんへの「好き」が心の内で吹雪のように吹き荒れる氷室くんはもう一歩を踏み出せず、一方の冬月さんは自分の感情に超が付くほど鈍感で!?　Twitter＆pixivで大人気!!　クールな二人のピュア過ぎラブコメディー♪　単行本だけの描き下ろしマンガ３編を収録☆
description.ko:
현대를 살아가는 설녀의 후예 히무로와 
약간 독특하면서도 상냥한 동료 후유츠키. 

언뜻 보면 쿨해보이는 두 사람이지만, 연애에 관해서는 놀랄 만큼 서투르다. 
후유츠키를 향한 ‘호감’이 마음속에서 눈보라처럼 몰아치자, 
히무로는 더 이상 한 걸음도 나아가지 못하고. 
후유츠키 역시도 자신의 감정에 둔감하기는 마찬가지였는데!? 

Twitter&pixiv에서 대인기!! 
쿨한 두 사람의 맑다 못해 투명한 러브 코미디♪ 

단행본만의 오리지널 에피소드 3편도 수록☆
description.pl: Poznajcie Himuro, żyjącego we współczesnej Japonii potomka yuki-onny, oraz jego nieco nietypową koleżankę z biurka obok, Fuyutsuki. Choć na pierwszy rzut oka oboje wydają się spokojni i opanowani, tak naprawdę w miłości nie do końca dobrze sobie radzą. Himuro, w którego sercu panuje miłosna zamieć, nie jest w stanie wykonać kolejnego kroku naprzód, zaś Fuyutsuki zdaje się nie zauważać jego starań…
description.ru: Милый пушистый роман о классной работнице и её, холодном как лёд, коллеге.
description.th:
ฮิมุโระคุง ชายหนุ่มผู้สืบเชื้อสายของสาวหิมะซึ่งใช้ชีวิตอยู่ในยุคปัจจุบัน 
และคุณฟุยุสึกิ เพื่อนร่วมงานสาวผู้อ่อนโยนและค่อนข้างไม่เหมือนใคร 
หากมองแค่ผิวเผิน หนุ่มสาวคู่นี้ก็ดูเป็นคนคูลๆ อยู่หรอก 
แต่พอเป็นเรื่องราวความรักแล้ว ทั้งสองกลับไม่เอาไหนซะเลย
ฮิมุโระคุงผู้ได้แต่เก็บความ "ชอบ" 
ที่มีต่อฟุยุสึกิไว้ในใจประหนึ่งพายุหิมะที่โหมกระหน่ำ 
โดยไม่กล้าก้าวออกไปเริ่มต้นสักที 
ส่วนฝ่ายคุณฟุยุสึกิเองก็ช่างความรู้สึกช้าไม่รู้ใจตัวเองเลย!?
description.tr: Sevimli iş arkadaşıyla her konuştuğunda çevreyi donduran ve Yuki-Onna'nın soyundan gelen adam hakkında sevimli, kabarık bir romantizm.
description.vi: Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy. Một câu chuyện tình yêu lãng mạn và dễ thương về một một cô nàng lạnh lùng và đồng nghiệp của cô ấy.
description.zh: 冰属性男子与酷酷女同事漫画 ，当雪男遇上酷酷女同事，办公室将掀起一场恋爱暴风雪！
description.pt-br: Himuro-kun, descendente de uma Yuki-onna moderna, acabou de chegar em seu novo trabalho, e acaba criando tempestades de neve e bonecos de neve quando é tomado por suas emoções e perde o controle. Sua paixão secreta por Fuyutsuki-san, uma colega de trabalho única, mas gentil, cresce tão forte que congela às vezes aqueles ao seu redor. Por outro lado, Fuyutsuki-san, que muitas vezes é visto como legal pelos outros, também está muito interessada no misterioso Himuro-kun. O relacionamento deles muda gradualmente através do trabalho diário e dos eventos da empresa, e eles também começam a passar tempo juntos, mas ambos são desajeitados no amor e não conseguem se aproximar…

altTitles.ja: 追放する側の物語
追放する側の物語 仲間を追放したらパーティーが弱体化したけど、世界一を目指します。

altTitles.en: The Story Of The Banisher Side After Banishing The Party Member - The Party Was Weakened, But We Aim To Be The Best In The World

altTitles.ja-ro: Tsuihou Suru Gawa no Monogatari - Nakama wo Tsuihou Shitara Party ga Jakutaika Shitakedo, Sekaiichi wo Mezashimasu.

description.en:
"Exile" and you're weakened!? A "do-over" fantasy of a failed party!
"Stardust", an up-and-coming party, in order to aim even higher, expels Est, a “burden” of the party members.
But as a result, the party is weakened and Est is awakened!

In this "Serves You Right!" situation, a swordsman with zero motivation and zero pride rises to the occasion!
This is a story about the "Aftermath" of the "Side that Banished Him".
